actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Transportation to make an investigation and study to determine a National Transportation Policy which will result in maximum energy efficiency in our national transportation system.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Transportation to make an investigation and study to determine a National Transportation Policy which will result in maximum energy efficiency in our national transportation system. Authorizes appropriations of sums necessary to carry out the purposes of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Transportation to make an investigation and study to determine a National Transportation Policy which will result in maximum energy efficiency in our national transportation system.
